Title: Open Source Friday with OpenSSF - Global Cyber Policy Working Group
Author: GitHub
Description:
✨ Join us live as we learn more about OpenSSF's Global Cyber Policy Working Group with Madalin Neag OpenSSF EU Policy Advisor, Christopher Robinson (SecurityCRob) and David Wheeler (drdavidawheeler) to learn more about OpenSSF Global Cyber Policy Working Group (WG) and the EU Cyber Resilience Act (CRA).

We’ll explore what the Cyber Policy Working Group is, the gropus goals and learn more about the legislation, regulation, and cybersecurity frameworks and standards that are head to ensure everyone can meet their compliance obligations.

Whether you're new to security, CRA, or OpenSSF, this stream will help you prepare and manage cybersecurity, and understand the EU Cyber Resilience Act (CRA).

Bring your questions and curiosity!
